data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Sylhet, Sylhet, Bangladesh that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sylhet, Sylhet, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sylhet. Through your servants plant 686 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Sylhet, Sylhet, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Sylhet, Sylhet, Bangladesh a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Sylhet prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Birjia people.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Sylhet.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sylhet, Sylhet, Bangladesh to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 4,302 believers in the county of Sylhet the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
